<style>
/* ensure the page can’t create a horizontal gutter */
html, body { overflow-x: clip; }

/* IMPORTANT: Quarto’s layout container can cap width */
.quarto-container { max-width: none !important; }

/* Full-bleed breakout */
.video-fullbleed{
  width: 100vw;
  margin-left: calc(50% - 50vw);
  margin-right: calc(50% - 50vw);

  aspect-ratio: 16/9;
  max-height: 80vh;
  position: relative;
  background: #000;
}

.video-fullbleed iframe{
  position:absolute; inset:0;
  width:100%; height:100%;
  border:0;
}
</style>

<div class="video-fullbleed">
  <iframe
    src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rwSMgGkb8sI?rel=0&modestbranding=1&playsinline=1"
    allow="encrypted-media; picture-in-picture"
    allowfullscreen></iframe>
</div>
